title: Let's Check Out Darkest Dungeon II with KC and Jesse
description:
Starting this Tuesday, each week KC, Jesse, Amy or Will, will be checking out a new recently released indie game that they think you shouldn't skip out on. This week, we're checking out Darkest Dungeon II.
